sentences.sContent: Sarah made a menacing gesture with her fist.
sentences.sCn: 萨拉用拳头做了个威胁的手势。

sentences.sContent: They decided it would be a nice gesture to send her a card.
sentences.sCn: 他们认为给她寄一张卡片会是一种友好的表示。

sentences.sContent: He gestured for her to take a seat.

phrases.pCn: 做手势，表示；做一个手势

words.tran: 用姿势示意；（讲话时）做手势
用手势谈话；做姿势表达

trans.tranOther: a movement of part of your body, especially your hands or head, to show what you mean or how you feel
to move your hand, arm, or head to tell someone something, or show them what you mean
